Title: Ek Nadir Galpo
Writer: Sunil Gangopadhyay (story), Samir Chanda (screenplay), Shyamali Dey (screenplay)
Actors: Mithun Chakraborty, Nirmal Kumar, Montu Mahapatra, Shweta Prasad
Plot: Darakeshwar (Mithun) and Anu (Swetha) are father and daughter. Tragedy strikes as Anu drowns in Keleghai river. Now Darakeshwar's only goal is to rename the river Keleghai as Anjana in memory of his loving daughter.
